top.title: Naked images remained in Epstein files despite outcry

top.title: US must be prudent when supplying arms to Taiwan, Xi tells Trump

top.title: 55,000 Ukrainian soldiers killed in war with Russia, Zelensky says
top.summary: The Ukrainian president also said a large number of people were "officially missing", meaning the total death toll is thought to be much higher.

top.title: ChatGPT boss ridiculed for online 'tantrum' over rival's Super Bowl ad

top.title: UK's £8bn research fund faces 'hard decisions' as it pauses new grants
